title: higher ping
body: anyone getting higher ping now? like week ago i was 39 ping now im 70 wtf? in florida also

replies.body: I have the same thing.  Before was 27-29 ms then all of a sudden today I'm getting average 70 ms
I've been getting the same thing and its recently new/

A sudden change in your ping could be caused for a few reasons, like packet loss and other network issues.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of what's going on.  The results will also give some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue, which should get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
has nothing to do with us. its on your end. look at the server maintenance issues posted.

South Florida here. Up until a couple of days ago I was constantly 45 ms. 

I went on twitch to watch GoodGuyGary and noticed his ping which was constantly 41 ms had jumped to 48, Central Florida, Check his past broadcasts and compare it to his newest from tonight.

Out of curiosity I logged on and sure enough I'm also affected. Went from a constant 45 ms as of a couple days ago to now 56-57 ms constant.

Something is definitely wrong, at least in Florida.

And no the hurricane hasn't gotten here yet! ;-p

Please look into this. Thanks!

This reminds me of pre server migration which when I started playing I was in the 70s ms and it slowly crept up to 120 ms over the years pre migration. I really hope this isn't the road we are headed towards again.

Pretty much the same problem. I went from 80-90 to 130-150. Ran through all the connection guide, tried some other non-riot stuff and got a few changes but nothing really brings it back down. When i ping the server its actually saying 90. When I was at 80-90 it was 10-20 off and pinging at 60-70 in cmd but now the difference is a whole 40-50 ms and this is only on League, streams, other games and such still run perfectly at their usual ping (60-90 depending on their servers)

I also have high ping my ping has been sky rocketing today and I just got dcd as I ulted on sion and when i came back from being dcd i still had the weird camera movement that his ult gets and it wouldnt go away
